definitions.definition: (chiefly in the plural) Medications, especially prescribed psychoactive medications.
definitions.example: He's been very strange. I wonder if he's not been taking his meds.

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the practice of medicine.
definitions.example: Do you have any medical experience?

definitions.definition: Intended to have a therapeutic effect; medicinal.
definitions.example: medical marijuana; medical cannabis; medical treatment
A costly medical condition can bankrupt you if it doesn't kill you first.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to the state of one's health.
Pertaining to or requiring treatment by other than surgical means.
